sections.TOP:
Mud Gate08979tkydj15vauxrxhateql21a67nnrpowf1607112014-09-27T22:22:56ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* See also */[[File:Mud_Gate.png|thumb|300px|A map showing the location of the '''Mud Gate'''.]]
The '''Mud Gate''' is a location in the [[Season 2|second season]]. It is a gate in the walls of [[King's Landing]] that opens near the shore of [[Blackwater Bay]].

[[Tyrion Lannister]] predicts that it will be the focal point of King [[Stannis Baratheon]]'s attack because it is weak and easy to land near.<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>

It is where the [[Battle of the Blackwater]] takes place as Stannis and his forces attempted to take King's Landing through that gate but were repelled by the city's defenders led by Tyrion and reinforcements from the Lannisters and the Tyrells.
sections.In the books: The official name of this gate is actually the "River Gate", but it's commonly known as the "Mud Gate".
